sentences.sContent: There are dilatation of blood sinus, hemolysis, macrophage reactions erc.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are dilatation of blood sinus, hemolysis, macrophage reactions erc.
sentences.sCn: 脾血窦扩张、溶血及巨噬细胞反应等现象；

sentences.sContent: The job description of a macrophage includes janitorial services such as this, particularly when there is lipid.
sentences.sContent_eng: The job description of a macrophage includes janitorial services such as this, particularly when there is lipid.
sentences.sCn: 巨噬细胞的这种防御功能，尤其是在含脂质较多的组织中发挥得更明显。

sentences.sContent: But macrophage signalling also involves SNAP-25, so Dr Chapman thinks he can use botulinum toxin to shut the cells up.
sentences.sContent_eng: But macrophage signalling also involves SNAP-25, so Dr Chapman thinks he can use botulinum toxin to shut the cells up.
sentences.sCn: 但是巨噬细胞的信号通路中也包括SNAP-25，因此查普曼博士想，他能够用肉毒素来关闭这些免疫细胞。

trans.tranOther: any large phagocytic cell occurring in the blood, lymph, and connective tissue of vertebrates
